enabled.inversity-normal.$description: Used in text-links, secondary and tertiary buttons.

hover.inversity-normal.$description: Used in text-links, secondary and tertiary buttons.

focus.inversity-normal.$description: Used in text-links, secondary and tertiary buttons.

pressed.inversity-normal.$description: Used in text-links, secondary and tertiary buttons.

selected.inversity-normal.$description: For navigation. fg does not change, only the indicator (other token). No use in buttons and text-links.

visited.inversity-normal.$description: For text-links. No use in buttons.

disabled.inversity-normal.$description: Used in text-links, secondary and tertiary buttons.

enabled.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for text and icon color in primary buttons.

hover.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for text and icon color in filled buttons, badges.

focus.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for text and icon color in filled buttons.

pressed.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for text and icon color in filled buttons.

selected.inversity-flipped.$description: For navigation. fg does not change, only the indicator (other token). No use in buttons and text-links.

visited.inversity-flipped.$description: For text-links. No use in buttons.

disabled.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for text and icon color in primary buttons.

enabled.inversity-normal.$description: Background for secondary and tertiary buttons.

hover.inversity-normal.$description: Background for secondary and tertiary buttons.

selected.inversity-normal.$description: For navigation. fg does not change, only the indicator (other token). No use in buttons and text-links.

visited.inversity-normal.$description: No use. For consistancy only. Text-links need no bg color.

disabled.inversity-normal.$description: Disabled tertiary bg must be transparent.

enabled.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for fill in primary buttons.

hover.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for fill in primary buttons.

focus.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for fill in primary buttons.

pressed.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for fill in primary buttons.

selected.inversity-flipped.$description: No use. Navigation items have no inverted variants like buttons do (primary).

visited.inversity-flipped.$description: No use. For consistancy only. Text-links need no bg color.

disabled.inversity-flipped.$description: Used for fill in e.g., primary buttons.
